name: Hold The Noise
description:
Hold The Noise is a very noisy game when you press the [SPACE] key, but you hear beautiful noises.
If you want to hear beautiful noise or get a high score from it, don't take off the [SPACE] key. It's definitely going to be an exciting time.

features

1. a very loud noise.
2. a comfortable and safe room.
3. And [SPACE]
